A classic, I have many great memories with this game and I would recommend it any time over CS:GO which is no longer a game but a fking marketplace! 
The graphics are still good despite the fact that the engine 17 years old. This game is a classic and I would recommend it any time! I lost a lot of hours in it as a kid ( used to play the nosteam version ) and it brings back to me a lot of amazing memories! Recommended! 10/10

I'm 22. About to be 23 in a few months. Here's my story.

When I was 14, I got struck down with depression. This led to me missing a lot of school in highschool and ultimately finishing 9th grade with a single credit.

I spent the rest of my teens trying to play catch up, finally receiving my high school diploma by age 19.

But when things seemed to be going well at 19, I was attacked and nearly raped. By the same relative who molested me my entire childhood. I became suicidal and was diagnosed with PTSD a year later.

At age 20, my mom died from cancer. She was a single parent and raised me all on her own since my deadbeat father left when I was 1.

I was now suffering from daily flashbacks due to my disorder.
Grieving the loss of the only parent I ever had.
And sobbing regularly thanks to the horrific things my father said to me while my mom lay dying in her hospital bed.

At 21, I dropped out of university.
I spent the rest of that year taking odd jobs at factories to pay my bills.

When I turned 22, I thought for sure it was my time to shine and begin living my life...

And then COVID happened.

I turn 23 on Dec 11.

I know I didn't waste my early 20s since I was suffering from so much traumatic ‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô• in the span of a few years that others experience over a lifetime, some never at all.

But as I begin my 23rd year. I feel lost.
My PTSD has been in remission for over a year. And I've healed from the loss of my mother... but I'm struggling to shake the feeling that I lost so much time, and will always play catch up with others in the same life arena.

I don't really know why I wrote all this down, but I guess if there's any other lonely soul out there who happens to see my comment, I just want you to know that you got this.

We didn't choose our life circumstances.
We didn't ask for our lives to go off plan.

But we are alive
We're healthy
We've been blessed with another day

If you're the same age as me, our lives are only just beginning.
If you're older, you too can realize your dreams, escape the rigid safety found in your daily routine, and live the life you thought could never be possible.

If you still got a pulse, God still has a purpose.

If you're still hurting, talk to someone about it.

If you feel bored, get lost in a good book.

If you feel lost or confused, reconnect with that inner child and find time to spend doing the things you loved so much as a little one.

I hope to revisit this review in a few years, perhaps before my 20s are up so I can update how my life has gone since then. Til then...

Take care internet stranger. You got this. :)

Este juego lo he jugado durante mucho tiempo y nunca tuve ni un solo problema, me iva a mas de 60 FPS muy fluido, podia jugar Online, hasta pude jugar el modo con bots sin ningun problema. La cosa es que hace poco,  lo volvi a instalar sin ningun problema y el modo Offline con bots vino fallado.....estos fueron los problemas que tuve al jugarlo : 


1. Me sacaba de las partidas sin que yo iniciara otra, ademas de que los bots brillaban por su ausencia
2. El arma y las manos de mi personaje aparecian y desaparecian a cada rato
3. Como dije antes, los bots no aparecian
4. Cuando buscaba otra partida, cambiaba el mapa que yo elegia, siendo que yo elegi que no se cambien los mapas

La verdad es una pena que esto me pase con este juegazo, me la pase muy bien jugando y nunca tuve problemas, como dije.
Decepcionante lo que han hecho con este juego, espero que lo resuelvan pronto porque enserio tengo ganas de volver al Source, pero por ahora, tendre que conformarme con jugar al 1.6

This game will land you a job at your dream company and your dream girl will fall in your lap. Once you beat bhop_monster_jam for the first time you get a complementary HJ from the former president of a country of your choice. Basically you need this game to play gmod.

Now where do i start...
The game is very nostalgic and legacy-like
Recently there has been almost no competition in CSS and it helps a lot for new players
The source engine physics makes it very easy to move around

Bad Things

The game does not receive enough update like TF2, The game is pulled aside to only make hardwares
The bots are pretty glitchy, and the UI is kinda outdated
And overall, the default microphone quality (even if you have a good mic) will be kinda bad
just love it it has been 26 years from i first started and still playing i will rank this the best fps of all time
